body: i could only find in spanish ultil page 13 the juicy parts are still in japanese. If i could find a full spanish translation i'll be glad to translate it
This was actually published and translated in Spanish many years ago. If I find it, I think I could use it to do an English translation.
How come there's no translation to this to this day??
Not to be that guy but how come this is the only saigado kof comic to never be translated!?
